DOC.brief_summary: This study three-armed randomise control trial aim determine effect structure educational programme physical activity level glucose tolerance individual impair glucose tolerance ( IGT ) . The educational programme design promote physical activity target perception knowledge IGT , exercise self-efficacy , self-regulatory skill . The study also investigate whether effectiveness educational programme promote self-regulatory skill physical activity enhance inclusion pedometer personalise step/day goal .
DOC.brief_title: Can Structured Education Promote Physical Activity Those Identified With Increased Risk Developing Diabetes
DOC.criteria: 2h blood glucose ≥ 7.8 mmol/l < 11.1 mmol/l Fasting plasma glucose < 7 mmol/l BMI ≥ 25 kg/m2 ( 23 kg/m2 South Asian ethnic origin ) Aged 18 Taking medication know significantly interfere glucose tolerance Participating regular vigorous physical activity Unable participate moderate intensity physical activity Pregnant
